channel.title: Need help badly! Please help me

item.title: Need help badly! Please help me
item.dc:creator: @Colton_Java Colton_Java
item.description:
@Colton_Java wrote:

I need to make the varrock bank safezone, but i cant could someone help or atleast tell me how to set a safezone up? I am using this code

	public boolean nonWildPvP() {
		if (absX >= 3205 && absX <= 3212 && absY >= 3226 && absY <= 3218) {
				return true;
			} else {
				return false;
		}
	}

Also, i forgot how to change home, havent coded in forever.
And how do i create a home teleport? Thanks! please help me with as many questions as possible

Read full topic
item.source: Need help badly! Please help me
